duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell and create Starbucks coffee beverages following Starbucks standards, providing caring hospitality and exceptional customer service through product knowledge.
Maintain work area and equipment in accordance with Health Department standards.
Provide exceptional customer experience by educating, sampling, and serving customers craveable food and beverage products.
Follow station specific duties and responsibilities and open/close area as per the checklist.
Maintain PAR stock levels and standards in product presentations.
Produce and present freshly prepared products following Starbucks recipes while meeting speed of service standards.
Maintain personal hygiene and professional dress code to comply with company, Starbucks, and Health Department standards.
